org.redkale.convert

类 SimpledCoder<R extends Reader,W extends Writer,T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.redkale.convert.SimpledCoder<R,W,T>
  • 类型参数:
    R - Reader输入的子类
    W - Writer输出的子类
    T - 序列化/反解析的数据类型
    所有已实现的接口:
    Decodeable<R,T>, Encodeable<W,T>
    直接已知子类:
    BigIntegerSimpledCoder, BoolArraySimpledCoder, BoolSimpledCoder, BsonSimpledCoder, ByteArraySimpledCoder, ByteSimpledCoder, CharArraySimpledCoder, CharSequenceSimpledCoder, CharSimpledCoder, CompletionHandlerSimpledCoder, DateSimpledCoder, DLongSimpledCoder, DLongSimpledCoder.DLongJsonSimpledCoder, DoubleArraySimpledCoder, DoubleSimpledCoder, EnumSimpledCoder, FloatArraySimpledCoder, FloatSimpledCoder, InetAddressSimpledCoder, InetAddressSimpledCoder.InetAddressJsonSimpledCoder, InetAddressSimpledCoder.InetSocketAddressJsonSimpledCoder, InetAddressSimpledCoder.InetSocketAddressSimpledCoder, IntArraySimpledCoder, IntSimpledCoder, JsonSimpledCoder, LongArraySimpledCoder, LongSimpledCoder, NumberSimpledCoder, PatternSimpledCoder, ShortArraySimpledCoder, ShortSimpledCoder, StringArraySimpledCoder, StringSimpledCoder, TypeSimpledCoder

    public abstract class SimpledCoder<R extends Reader,W extends Writer,T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Decodeable<R,T>, Encodeable<W,T>

    详情见: http://www.redkale.org
